results.content:
Valuable information, especially performance part about CRP optimization and chrome dev tools tips and tricks. To me it was really helpful.  
But I think I should mention that first lectures were too general and the most valuable part is at the end of the course, so you have to watch all the lecture to get the full understanding. But it’s worth it.
